BestSoFar.framework.core.helper

Class ChildrenManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & EventuallyImmutable,P extends ParentOf<C> & EventuallyImmutable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BestSoFar.framework.core.helper.ChildrenManager<C,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParentOf<C>

    public class ChildrenManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & EventuallyImmutable,P extends ParentOf<C> & EventuallyImmutable>
extends Object
implements ParentOf<C>
    A helper object that manages a list of children in an EventuallyImmutable parent-child hierarchy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChildrenManager(P managedParent)
      Constructs a ChildrenManager with an empty children list.
      ChildrenManager(P managedParent, List<C> children)
      Constructs a ChildrenManager with the given children list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete()
      Called when the managed parent has been deleted to delete all its children..
      void discardNext()
      Called when the managed parent is having its replacement discarded, and discards all of its childrens' replacements.
      void discardPrevious()
      Called when the managed parent is having its older versions discarded, and discards all of its childrens' older versions.
      void fixAsVersion(VersionInfo versionInfo)
      Called when the managed parent is being fixed and is still mutable.
      P withChildren(List<C> newChildren)
      Return a version of this with the given children.

      • ChildrenManager

        public ChildrenManager(P managedParent)
        Constructs a ChildrenManager with an empty children list.

      • ChildrenManager

        public ChildrenManager(@NonNull
               P managedParent,
               @NonNull
               List<C> children)
        Constructs a ChildrenManager with the given children list. The list won't be mutated (i.e. it is fine for children to be Collections.unmodifiableList).
        Parameters:
        managedParent - the parent who's children this will manage.
        children -

    • Method Detail

      • withChildren

        public P withChildren(@NonNull
             List<C> newChildren)
        Description copied from interface: ParentOf
        Return a version of this with the given children.

        If this object can be mutated it will be, with this being returned. Otherwise a clone of this will be created with the given children.

        Specified by:
        withChildren in interface ParentOf<C extends ChildOf<P> & EventuallyImmutable>
        Parameters:
        newChildren - the children to be given to the returned object.
        Returns:
        a version of this with the given children.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Called when the managed parent has been deleted to delete all its children..

      • fixAsVersion

        public void fixAsVersion(VersionInfo versionInfo)
        Called when the managed parent is being fixed and is still mutable.

        One of four scenarios caused this update:

        1. A child has mutated

        2. Another property of the this parent has been changed

        3. A child has been deleted or moved to another parent

        4. A new child has been added to this parent

        Parameters:
        versionInfo - the new version information.

      • discardNext

        public void discardNext()
        Called when the managed parent is having its replacement discarded, and discards all of its childrens' replacements.

      • discardPrevious

        public void discardPrevious()
        Called when the managed parent is having its older versions discarded, and discards all of its childrens' older versions.
